front.title: Path MTU (PMTU) for Segment Routing Policy

abstract.t: This document defines the Path MTU (PMTU) for SR Policy (called SR- PMTU) and it applies to both SRv6 and SR-MPLS. The framework of SR- PMTU for SR Policy is specified, including link MTU collection, SR- PMTU Computation, SR-PMTU Enforcement, and Handling behaviors on the headend.
